description: Creates a snapshot of a DB cluster. For more information on Amazon Aurora, see What is Amazon Aurora? in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. For more information on Multi-AZ DB clusters, see Multi-AZ DB cluster deployments in the Amazon RDS User Guide.

parameters.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the DB cluster snapshot. This parameter is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must contain from 1 to 63 letters, numbers, or hyphens. First character must be a letter. Can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Example: my-cluster1-snapshot1

parameters.name: DBClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the DB cluster to create a snapshot for. This parameter isn't case-sensitive. Constraints: Must match the identifier of an existing DBCluster. Example: my-cluster1

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the DB cluster snapshot. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon RDS resource consisting of a key-value pair. For more information, see Tagging Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon RDS User Guide or Tagging Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshot
nested_items.description: Contains the details for an Amazon RDS DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The list of Availability Zones (AZs) where instances in the DB cluster snapshot can be restored.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier for the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The DB cluster identifier of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the snapshot was taken, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The name of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: EngineMode
nested_items.description: The engine mode of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: AllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The allocated storage size of the DB cluster snapshot in gibibytes (GiB).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of this DB cluster snapshot. Valid statuses are the following:
available.
copying.
creating.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port that the DB cluster was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC ID associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: ClusterCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the DB cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: MasterUsername
nested_items.description: The master username for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: The license model information for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotType
nested_items.description: The type of the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: PercentProgress
nested_items.description: The percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the DB cluster snapshot is encrypted.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the Amazon Web Services KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SourceDBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: If the DB cluster snapshot was copied from a source DB cluster snapshot, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source DB cluster snapshot, otherwise, a null value.

nested_items.name: IAMDatabaseAuthenticationEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether mapping of Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled.

nested_items.name: TagList
nested_items.description: A list of tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBSystemId
nested_items.description: Reserved for future use.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The storage type associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DbClusterResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource ID of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: StorageThroughput
nested_items.description: The storage throughput for the DB cluster snapshot. The throughput is automatically set based on the IOPS that you provision, and is not configurable.
